title: Love in the Snow
description: Iwanai, 1979 A sweet love story of two lonely teenagers growing up from a tragic childhood. Hana and Yuji are just discovering their passion for life when he is diagnosed with schizophrenia. Tokyo, 1999 Rising pop star receives a mysterious song composed twenty years ago. It stirs his curiosity, and his love for music.
author: Acton Liz
